name: Lair of Torment
description:
Lair of Torment is a short indie first-person puzzle horror game in the walking simulator genre.

Description.
Deep underground there is an asylum, in the dark and damp corridors of which an atmosphere of fear and terror reigns.
There, in the darkness and silence, the walls whisper secret stories, and impenetrable curtains between reality and nightmares create an atmosphere of tension and mystery.
However, despite all the dangers, the protagonist dares to enter the terrifying asylum, to find answers to his questions and destroy the evil that dwells there.

Gameplay.
You will have to visit a frightening place where there has been no light for a long time. Beautiful graphics and high quality 3D sound will help you to fully experience the atmosphere of the game.

Warning!.
The game contains flashes of light that can cause epileptic seizures.
